channel.title: Hit the Streets (September 2019)
channel.description:
**Hit the Streets: Defend the Block** is an RPG about street level supers. You'll play Super Powered Beings (SPBs for short) who've teamed up to protect their neighborhood from crime and corruption. In our first session, we'll map out a neighbourhood, establish how and why your team came together, their relationships, and figure out who their rivals are. In terms of scale, the game is geared more towards Marvel's Netflix series than The Avengers movies.
This is for 4 sessions of Hit the Streets over September. Sessions will be 3 hours each. Sessions will be recorded, but I'll ask permission before posting them on YouTube.
Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
For this series we'll be using Lines and Veils, the X-card safety tool, and the Open Table Policy will also be in effect. For more information on the Gauntlet’s safety tools, please refer to our Inclusivity Policy on the website (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
[date=2019-09-05 time=19:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-09-05 time=22:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lk5KZuOYl6pT7vY9l8w)
[date=2019-09-12 time=19:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-09-12 time=22:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lk5KwLpZqfaCMxFTlwh)
[date=2019-09-19 time=19:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-09-19 time=22:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lk5L7KC5ncvZm-mZOFm)
[date=2019-09-26 time=19:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-09-26 time=22:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lk5LaeOI0wgP6bbLPQa)
